content.html: Can someone explain to me why shooting the insurgents was not an option? Wasn’t even a thought… so much so they started calling loved ones to say goodbye. Meanwhile, unarmed black people are shot while running away.
content.value: Can someone explain to me why shooting the insurgents was not an option? Wasn’t even a thought… so much so they started calling loved ones to say goodbye. Meanwhile, unarmed black people are shot while running away.
